survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand their experiences, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Which features are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question. Allow respondents to select multiple options.

script.question_text: Which features are most important to you when choosing an electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction questions. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Follow up with Q7 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Please describe the safety concerns you have encountered.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q6 is answered with 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question for detailed feedback. Ensure response box is large enough.

script.question_text: Please describe the safety concerns you have encountered.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q6 is answered with 'Yes'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for likelihood questions. Ensure clear labeling.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend electric scooter sharing services to others?

questions.question_text: Which payment method do you prefer for electric scooter sharing services?
answer_options: Mobile Payment (e.g., Apple Pay, Google Pay)
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
